name: Azzy's
description:
Azzy's

Azzy,  a young girl who died in 2021.  She went to hell because she stole and hoarded the precious toilet paper. Now it's up to her to escape hell, but be aware there are traps in there. 

Link to the Theme - 

The idea was that it would play a lot like Unfair Mario which would make the player keep restarting the level as they would get caught and killed in traps that would spawn out of nowhere and that would link back to the theme where the player is stuck in that loop of retrying the level till they get to the end. But due to some knowledge limitations, Connor couldn't implement it all into the game as he doesn't specialise in programming. 

Credits - 
  • Leia,  the artist and sound designer behind the game. She controlled the asset production like the environment pieces, the character designs and also the background music. 
  • Connor, the technical person behind the game. He programmed the game's mechanics and also created the level design. 
"Best Game Ever!",  Perfect Timed Studios 2021
